b.span: Click here for important information from the Wellness Center during school closure.

div.p:
Delcastle offers a variety of educational experiences for students integrating academic courses with practical vocational-technical problem solving. Lessons learned in math and English are re-enforced in the student’s career program.
Visit Website

Built in 1974, Hodgson has approximately 1,100 students enrolled in its full-time career training programs.
Visit Website

span.data-title: Teacher Academy for Early Childhood Education

a.span: Teacher Academy for Early Childhood Education

div.p:
Howard provides a rigorous, comprehensive, vocational technical program in a modern setting with deep historical roots.
Visit Website

The newest comprehensive, 1000-pupil VoTech high school opened in November 2006.
Visit Website

Academic Programs

Admissions

div.class: column sm-1-1 md-1-3 lg-1-4 sm-text-left md-text-right lg-text-right

p.span: Due to the school closure, School-Based Health Centers (Wellness Centers) are closed at this time. If you have a medical emergency, please call 911. If you have a mental health emergency, please call Child Priority Response 24 hr Crisis Line 800-969-4357. For medical concerns contact your primary care provider or visit a Medical Aid Unit. If you have a question for your School-Based Heath Center provider, please send a text message to 302-285-9661. You will receive a reply when texting this line during normal business hours 8am-4pm Monday through Friday within 24 hrs.

span.br: Debido al cierre de la escuela, los centros de salud basados ​​en la escuela (centros de bienestar) están cerrados en este momento. Si tiene una emergencia médica, llame al 911. Si tiene una emergencia de salud mental, llame a Child Priority Response 24 hr Crisis Line 800-969-4357. Para inquietudes médicas, comuníquese con su proveedor de atención primaria o visite una Unidad de Asistencia Médica. Si tiene una pregunta para su proveedor del Centro de salud escolar, envíe un mensaje de texto al 302-285-9661. Recibirá una respuesta cuando envíe un mensaje de texto a esta línea durante el horario comercial normal de 8 am a 4 pm de lunes a viernes dentro de las 24 horas.

div.p: La traducción ha sido proporcionada por Google Translate.
